res.rBody: Dum sacramenta offeret beatus Martinus globus igneus apparuit super caput eius

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-S

verses.vBody:
Orante sancto Martino
apparuit ei angelus domini
silent reading

Oculis ac manibus in caelum semper intentus
invictum ab oratione spiritum invictu ab oratione spiritu non relaxabat
Ita ut in sublime contendens longum admodum crinem flamma produceret

rep.wit: CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-S CAO-F CAO-L
